subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Ronald Ramon barely beat the final horn with a winning 3-pointer from the left wing and No. 21 Pittsburgh rallied in the final minute Thursday night to defeat visiting West Virginia, 55-54.
snippet: Ronald Ramon barely beat the final horn with a winning 3-pointer from the left wing and No. 21 Pittsburgh rallied in the final minute Thursday night to defeat visiting West Virginia, 55-54.
